name: Ralston_Bonded_Leather_Reclining_Sofa_and_Loveseat_Set
description: Watch TV from this Ralston bonded-leather loveseat after work, or take a nap on the reclining sofa on a lazy Sunday. This set offers provides comfortable seating for five people, giving you enough space to have friends over for movie night or sports games.Set includes one sofa and one loveseat, which ship in separate boxesEach piece features two recliners for maximum comfortCrafted from solid wood and bonded leather for durabilityPolyurethane foam is covered with dark leather for smoothness and comfortTufted back supports your bodyArms measure 26"HSeats measure 19"H x 21.5"DLoveseat measures 40"H x 59"W x 39"DSpace between loveseat arms is 43"WSofa measures 39"H x 82"W x 40"DSpace between sofa arms is 64"WStyleContemporaryMaterialBonded Leather, WoodChair TypeReclinersSet Include2 PieceAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBlack, GreyFurniture PatternSolid
